casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Nicholas HOLMES. No. 283P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 24, 2006. Jeffrey Evan Noecker, Wilmington, for Nicholas Holmes. Edward W. Grannis, Jr., District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd day of May 2006 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 24th day of May 2006."
